content: Hi folks. Is there a minimal set of fields required for the Library resource for a barebones CQL to work? I realize this could be in an IG but I mean more on the processing side of things.

What I'm trying to do is to create the most minimal set of Measure/Library/CQL for something very simple. There's a lot of great documentation and many, many examples, but I can't see the precise, minimal linkages between Measure-Library-CQL.

Hi @Richard Stanley , ExecutableLibrary is focused only on the runtime aspects of a CQL library, and the Library Resources section of the Libraries documentation in CPG describes the linkages and mappings between CQL and FHIR.
